works.description:
We publish Calls for Tender for the Air  
Traffic Control Industry. The person who created this blog is copying the 

details of the tenders but he does not actually have the tender  
documentation to sell. So this is also a fraud issue.

This person has been blackmailing our company for the last 2 weeks. By  
threatening to set up this blog with information about the tenders.
We have reported the blackmail to the Police here in Maastricht, The  
Netherlands. Case number PL2411 2011070827-1. All threats and blackmails  
were sent from India account carlitored@gmail.com. The site was set up  
using atc.tenders@gmail.com

Regards,
Chris Wade
Tel +31 43 3640702
Mob +31 646 308282
